segments.text: Do you think the bad weather will last long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . It changes so quickly this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . We have planed to visit the square but we have to cancel it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you can go to visit the museum . It's worth seeing . You can go to the square some other time .
segments.speaker: S2
